FileOperationFlags to add in addition to FOF_ALLOWUNDO

member.name: M:DualityEditor.RecycleBin.Send(System.String)

member.param: Location of directory or file to recycle

member.name: T:DualityEditor.NativeMethods.FileOperationFlags
member.summary: Possible flags for the SHFileOperation method.

member.name: F:DualityEditor.NativeMethods.FileOperationFlags.FOF_SILENT
member.summary: Do not show a dialog during the process

member.name: F:DualityEditor.NativeMethods.FileOperationFlags.FOF_NOCONFIRMATION
member.summary: Do not ask the user to confirm selection

member.name: F:DualityEditor.NativeMethods.FileOperationFlags.FOF_ALLOWUNDO
member.summary: Delete the file to the recycle bin. (Required flag to send a file to the bin

member.name: F:DualityEditor.NativeMethods.FileOperationFlags.FOF_SIMPLEPROGRESS
member.summary: Do not show the names of the files or folders that are being recycled.

member.name: F:DualityEditor.NativeMethods.FileOperationFlags.FOF_NOERRORUI
member.summary: Surpress errors, if any occur during the process.

member.name: F:DualityEditor.NativeMethods.FileOperationFlags.FOF_WANTNUKEWARNING
member.summary: Warn if files are too big to fit in the recycle bin and will need to be deleted completely.

member.name: T:DualityEditor.NativeMethods.FileOperationType
member.summary: File Operation Function Type for SHFileOperation

member.name: F:DualityEditor.NativeMethods.FileOperationType.FO_MOVE
member.summary: Move the objects

member.name: F:DualityEditor.NativeMethods.FileOperationType.FO_COPY
member.summary: Copy the objects

member.name: F:DualityEditor.NativeMethods.FileOperationType.FO_DELETE
member.summary: Delete (or recycle) the objects

member.name: F:DualityEditor.NativeMethods.FileOperationType.FO_RENAME
member.summary: Rename the object(s)
